subject: Please confirm your email address to publish your project on TheSocioscope
has_been_correctly_uploaded_on_TheSocios: has been correctly uploaded on TheSocioscope
1: TheSocioscope can only publish projects with a verified contact email address. Please click on the button below to verify your contact email address :
2: On behalf of TheSocioscope, many thanks to you and to your institution
3: for contributing to this commons for research
6: Please note: Until you verify your email address, you will not receive any other email from us, and your project will not appear on TheSocioscope. This is to avoid projects uploaded by bots, and spam
